text:
Sourcegraph | sourcegraph.com | San Francisco, CA | Full-stack, frontend, and backend engineers

Code is data. Sourcegraph semantically indexes all the code in the world and makes the information accessible and useful to programming teams. We're building actual technology to enable your development team to learn, review, debug and ship code faster than ever before.

If interested, please send an email to hiring@sourcegraph.com.
